Class Wahlsystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • Wahlsystem

  • public class Wahlsystem
extends java.lang.Object
    The public class Wahlsystem collects information on the election process in Germany as described in URL "http://www.bundestagswahl-bw.de/wahlsystem_btw.html" by using the Jsoup package. By iterating through specified indices, the class returns the desired part of the URL and sends it to the SpeechletResponse to create a speech output.
    Version:
    1.1, 13.10.2017
    Author:
    severin engelmann , rainer wichmann

      This method is called by the getText method.
      static java.lang.String getText()
      This method creates a connection to a defined URL and subsequently calls the "extractInformation" method and returns its result to create a speech output in the AngekreutSpeechlet class.

      • extractInformation

        private static java.lang.String extractInformation(java.lang.String result,
                                                   org.jsoup.nodes.Document doc,
                                                   int start,
                                                   int ende)
        This method is called by the getText method. A for-loop is used to define the parts of the document to be retrieved.
        Parameters:
        result - String , which is returned, comprises a specified part of a document's body text.
        doc, - which is the HTML document.
        start, -
        ende, - start and ende are int, define indices to determine the desired extract of the document.
        Returns:
        returns the desired part of the document as a String.
